call_for_proposals.description: ICSOC is inviting applicants to submit proposals for high-quality workshops contributing to the scientific program of the main conference.
call_for_proposals.purpose: The workshop program seeks to provide venues for specialist groups to meet and hold focused discussions on specific sub-areas within Service-Oriented Computing and engage in community-building activities.
call_for_proposals.topics: Workshops should provide a discussion forum for researchers and industry professionals on topics related to the conference's main theme.

co_chairs.name: Jianwen Su
co_chairs.affiliation: University of California at Santa Barbara, CA, USA
